    20	Route::post('/lang/switch', function (Request $request) {
    21	    $lang = $request->input('lang');
    22	    if (in_array($lang, ['en', 'ar'])) {
    23	        session(['locale' => $lang]);
    24	        app()->setLocale($lang);
    25	    }
    26	    return back();
    27	})->name('lang.switch');

    55	/** PUBLIC: verify + gallery (single, closed block) */
    56	Route::match(['GET', 'POST'], '/verify', function (Request $r) {
    57	    $code = trim($r->input('code', ''));
    58	    $result = null;
    59	    if ($code !== '') {
    60	        $result = DB::table('certificates')->where('verification_code', $code)->first();
    61	    }
    62	    return view('public.verify', compact('result', 'code'));
    63	})->name('verify');

    82	/** Friendly /signin router + alias (no controller dependency) */
    83	Route::get('/signin', function (\Illuminate\Http\Request $r) {
    84	    $type = strtolower($r->query('type',''));
    85	    if (in_array($type, ['organization','organisation','org'])) {
    86	        return redirect()->to('/login?type=organization');
    87	    }
    88	    return redirect()->to('/login?type=volunteer');
    89	})->name('signin');

=== routes/_opportunities.php ===
     1	<?php
     2	
     3	use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Route;
     4	use Illuminate\Support\Facades\DB;
     5	use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Schema;
     6	use Illuminate\Http\Request;
     7	
     8	Route::get('/opportunities', function (Request $r) {
     9	    $q = trim($r->get('q', ''));
    10	
    11	    if (!Schema::hasTable('opportunities')) {
    12	        $rows = collect([]); $cats = collect([]); $regions = collect([]);
    13	        $view = collect(['opportunities.public.index','opportunities.index','public.opportunities'])
    14	            ->first(fn($v) => view()->exists($v)) ?? 'opportunities.public.index';
    15	        return view($view, compact('rows','cats','regions','q') + ['opportunities'=>$rows]);
    16	    }
    17	
    18	    $cols = Schema::getColumnListing('opportunities');
    19	
    20	    $title  = in_array('title',$cols) ? 'title' : (in_array('name',$cols) ? 'name' : null);
    21	    $desc   = in_array('description',$cols) ? 'description' : (in_array('details',$cols) ? 'details' : null);
    22	    $region = in_array('region',$cols) ? 'region' : (in_array('emirate',$cols) ? 'emirate' : null);
    23	    $city   = in_array('city',$cols) ? 'city' : null;
    24	    $cat    = in_array('category',$cols) ? 'category' : null;
    25	    $date   = collect(['start_date','date','event_date','starts_at'])->first(fn($c)=>in_array($c,$cols));
    26	
    27	    $query = DB::table('opportunities');
    28	    $select = array_values(array_filter(['id',$title,$city,$region,$cat,$date,$desc]));
    29	    if ($select) $query->select($select);
    30	
    31	    if ($q && ($title || $desc)) {
    32	        $query->where(function($w) use ($q,$title,$desc){
    33	            if ($title) $w->where($title,'like',"%$q%");
    34	            if ($desc)  $w->orWhere($desc,'like',"%$q%");
    35	        });
    36	    }
    37	    if ($cat && $r->filled('category'))  $query->where($cat, $r->category);
    38	    if ($region && $r->filled('region')) $query->where($region, $r->region);
    39	
    40	    if ($date) $query->orderByDesc($date);
    41	    $query->orderByDesc('id');
    42	
    43	    $rows = $query->paginate(24);
    44	    $rows->appends($r->query());
    45	
    46	    $cats    = $cat    ? DB::table('opportunities')->whereNotNull($cat)->distinct()->orderBy($cat)->pluck($cat) : collect();
    47	    $regions = $region ? DB::table('opportunities')->whereNotNull($region)->distinct()->orderBy($region)->pluck($region) : collect();
    48	
    49	    $view = collect(['opportunities.public.index','opportunities.index','public.opportunities'])
    50	            ->first(fn($v) => view()->exists($v)) ?? 'opportunities.public.index';
    51	
    52	    return view($view, [
    53	        'rows'=>$rows, 'opportunities'=>$rows,
    54	        'cats'=>$cats, 'regions'=>$regions, 'q'=>$q,
    55	    ]);
    56	})->name('opportunities.index');
    57	
    58	Route::get('/opportunities/{id}', function ($id) {
    59	    if (!Schema::hasTable('opportunities')) abort(404);
    60	    $o = DB::table('opportunities')->where('id',$id)->first();
    61	    abort_unless($o, 404);
    62	
    63	    $view = collect(['opportunities.public.show','opportunities.show'])
    64	            ->first(fn($v)=>view()->exists($v)) ?? 'opportunities.public.show';
    65	
    66	    return view($view, ['o'=>$o, 'opportunity'=>$o]);
    67	})->whereNumber('id')->name('opps.public.show');

=== Providers that may bind routes/middleware ===

=== app/Providers/LoadAllRoutesServiceProvider.php (first 200) ===
     1	<?php
     2	namespace App\Providers;
     3	
     4	use Illuminate\Support\ServiceProvider;
     5	use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Route;
     6	
     7	class LoadAllRoutesServiceProvider extends ServiceProvider
     8	{
     9	    public function register(): void {}
    10	    public function boot(): void
    11	    {
    12	        $all = glob(base_path('routes/*.php'));
    13	        $skip = ['console.php','api.php','web.php']; // web.php is already loaded by bootstrap/app.php
    14	        foreach ($all as $file) {
    15	            $base = basename($file);
    16	            if (in_array($base, $skip)) continue;
    17	            if (str_starts_with($base, 'web.backup')) continue;
    18	            if (is_dir(base_path('routes/_disabled')) && file_exists(base_path('routes/_disabled/'.$base))) continue;
    19	            Route::middleware('web')->group($file);
    20	        }
    21	    }
    22	}

=== app/Providers/ViewComposerServiceProvider.php (first 200) ===
     1	<?php
     2	
     3	namespace App\Providers;
     4	
     5	use Illuminate\Support\ServiceProvider;
     6	use Illuminate\Support\Facades\View;
     7	use Illuminate\Support\Facades\DB;
     8	use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Auth;
     9	use Illuminate\Support\Carbon;
    10	
    11	class ViewComposerServiceProvider extends ServiceProvider
    12	{
    13	    public function boot(): void
    14	    {
    15	        // KPIs
    16	        View::composer('org.partials.dashboard_v1', function ($view) {
    17	            try {
    18	                $orgId = DB::table('organizations')->where('owner_user_id', Auth::id())->value('id');
    19	                $now   = Carbon::now();
    20	                $kpi = ['upcoming'=>0,'appsTotal'=>0,'appsApproved'=>0,'appsPending'=>0,'checkinsToday'=>0];
    21	
    22	                if ($orgId) {
    23	                    $oppIds = DB::table('opportunities')->where('organization_id', $orgId)->pluck('id');
    24	                    $kpi['upcoming'] = DB::table('opportunities')->where('organization_id',$orgId)->where('start_at','>=',$now)->count();
    25	                    if ($oppIds->isNotEmpty()) {
    26	                        $kpi['appsTotal']     = DB::table('applications')->whereIn('opportunity_id',$oppIds)->count();
    27	                        $kpi['appsApproved']  = DB::table('applications')->where('status','approved')->whereIn('opportunity_id',$oppIds)->count();
    28	                        $kpi['appsPending']   = DB::table('applications')->where('status','pending')->whereIn('opportunity_id',$oppIds)->count();
    29	                        $kpi['checkinsToday'] = DB::table('attendances')->whereDate('check_in_at',$now->toDateString())->whereIn('opportunity_id',$oppIds)->count();
    30	                    }
    31	                }
    32	                $view->with('kpi', $kpi);
    33	            } catch (\Throwable $e) {}
    34	        });
    35	
    36	        // Recent Activity
    37	        View::composer('org.partials.recent_activity', function ($view) {
    38	            try {
    39	                $orgId = DB::table('organizations')->where('owner_user_id', Auth::id())->value('id');
    40	                $activities = [];
    41	                if ($orgId) {
    42	                    $oppIds = DB::table('opportunities')->where('organization_id',$orgId)->pluck('id')->all();
    43	                    if ($oppIds) {
    44	                        $a1 = DB::table('audit_logs')->where('entity_type','opportunity')->whereIn('entity_id',$oppIds)->orderByDesc('created_at')->limit(20)->get()->map(function($r){ $r->label=__('Opportunity');return $r;})->all();
    45	                        $appIds = DB::table('applications')->whereIn('opportunity_id',$oppIds)->pluck('id')->all();
    46	                        $a2 = $appIds ? DB::table('audit_logs')->where('entity_type','application')->whereIn('entity_id',$appIds)->orderByDesc('created_at')->limit(20)->get()->map(function($r){ $r->label=__('Application');return $r;})->all() : [];
    47	                        $attIds = DB::table('attendances')->whereIn('opportunity_id',$oppIds)->pluck('id')->all();
    48	                        $a3 = $attIds ? DB::table('audit_logs')->where('entity_type','attendance')->whereIn('entity_id',$attIds)->orderByDesc('created_at')->limit(20)->get()->map(function($r){ $r->label=__('Attendance');return $r;})->all() : [];
    49	                        $activities = array_merge($a1,$a2,$a3);
    50	                        usort($activities, fn($x,$y) => strcmp($y->created_at, $x->created_at));
    51	                        $activities = array_slice($activities, 0, 10);
    52	                    }
    53	                }
    54	                $view->with('activities', $activities);
    55	            } catch (\Throwable $e) {}
    56	        });
    57	
    58	        // Branding color
    59	        View::composer('org.partials.branding_styles', function ($view) {
    60	            try {
    61	                $orgId = DB::table('organizations')->where('owner_user_id', Auth::id())->value('id');
    62	                $color = null;
    63	                if ($orgId) {
    64	                    if (DB::getSchemaBuilder()->hasColumn('organizations','primary_color')) {
    65	                        $color = DB::table('organizations')->where('id',$orgId)->value('primary_color');
    66	                    }
    67	                    if (!$color) { $color = DB::table('settings')->where('key',"org:{$orgId}:primary_color")->value('value'); }
    68	                }
    69	                if ($color) $view->with('brandColor', $color);
    70	            } catch (\Throwable $e) {}
    71	        });
    72	
    73	        // Hours by event (last 90 days) for dashboard chart
    74	        View::composer('org.partials.hours_chart', function ($view) {
    75	            try {
    76	                $orgId = DB::table('organizations')->where('owner_user_id', Auth::id())->value('id');
    77	                $labels = []; $data = [];
    78	                if ($orgId) {
    79	                    $since = Carbon::now()->subDays(90)->toDateString();
    80	                    $rows = DB::table('attendances as a')
    81	                        ->join('opportunities as o','o.id','=','a.opportunity_id')
    82	                        ->selectRaw('a.opportunity_id, o.title, SUM(a.minutes) as mins')
    83	                        ->where('o.organization_id',$orgId)
    84	                        ->whereDate('a.check_in_at','>=',$since)
    85	                        ->groupBy('a.opportunity_id','o.title')
    86	                        ->orderByDesc(DB::raw('SUM(a.minutes)'))
    87	                        ->limit(8)
    88	                        ->get();
    89	                    foreach ($rows as $r) { $labels[] = $r->title ?? ('#'.$r->opportunity_id); $data[] = round(($r->mins ?? 0)/60, 2); }
    90	                }
    91	                $view->with('hoursChart', ['labels'=>$labels,'data'=>$data]);
    92	            } catch (\Throwable $e) {}
    93	        });
    94	    }
    95	}

=== app/Providers/OrgDashboardServiceProvider.php (first 200) ===
     1	<?php
     2	
     3	namespace App\Providers;
     4	
     5	use Illuminate\Support\ServiceProvider;
     6	use Illuminate\Support\Facades\View;
     7	use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Auth;
     8	use Carbon\Carbon;
     9	use App\Support\OrgMetrics;
    10	
    11	class OrgDashboardServiceProvider extends ServiceProvider
    12	{
    13	    public function register(): void {}
    14	
    15	    public function boot(): void
    16	    {
    17	        View::composer('*', function ($view) {
    18	            $request = request();
    19	            if (!$request || !$request->route()) {
    20	                return;
    21	            }
    22	
    23	            $routeName = optional($request->route())->getName();
    24	            $onOrgDash = ($routeName && strpos($routeName, 'org.dashboard') === 0)
    25	                        || $request->is('org') || $request->is('org/dashboard');
    26	
    27	            if (!$onOrgDash) {
    28	                return;
    29	            }
    30	
    31	            $user = Auth::user();
    32	            if (!$user || !isset($user->organization_id) || empty($user->organization_id)) {
    33	                return;
    34	            }
    35	
    36	            $range = $request->query('range');
    37	            $fromQ = $request->query('from');
    38	            $toQ   = $request->query('to');
    39	
    40	            if ($fromQ && $toQ) {
    41	                try {
    42	                    $from = Carbon::parse($fromQ)->startOfDay();
    43	                    $to   = Carbon::parse($toQ)->endOfDay();
    44	                } catch (\Throwable $e) {
    45	                    $from = Carbon::now()->subDays(29)->startOfDay();
    46	                    $to   = Carbon::now()->endOfDay();
    47	                }
    48	            } elseif ($range === '7d') {
    49	                $from = Carbon::now()->subDays(6)->startOfDay();
    50	                $to   = Carbon::now()->endOfDay();
    51	            } else {
    52	                $from = Carbon::now()->subDays(29)->startOfDay(); // default 30d window
    53	                $to   = Carbon::now()->endOfDay();
    54	            }
    55	
    56	            $m = OrgMetrics::compute((int)$user->organization_id, $from, $to);
    57	            $presentRate = $m['attendance_total'] > 0
    58	                ? round(($m['present'] / max(1, $m['attendance_total'])) * 100)
    59	                : 0;
    60	
    61	            $view->with('orgDashFrom', $from->toDateString());
    62	            $view->with('orgDashTo', $to->toDateString());
    63	            $view->with('orgDashMetrics', [
    64	                'total_minutes'    => $m['total_minutes'],
    65	                'attendance_total' => $m['attendance_total'],
    66	                'present'          => $m['present'],
    67	                'no_show'          => $m['no_show'],
    68	                'present_rate'     => $presentRate,
    69	                'unfinalized'      => $m['unfinalized'],
    70	            ]);
    71	        });
    72	    }
    73	}

=== app/Providers/DashboardCacheServiceProvider.php (first 200) ===
     1	<?php
     2	
     3	namespace App\Providers;
     4	
     5	use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Auth;
     6	use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Cache;
     7	use Illuminate\Support\Facades\DB;
     8	use Illuminate\Support\Facades\View;
     9	use Illuminate\Support\ServiceProvider;
    10	use Illuminate\Support\Carbon;
    11	
    12	class DashboardCacheServiceProvider extends ServiceProvider
    13	{
    14	    public function register(): void {}
    15	
    16	    public function boot(): void
    17	    {
    18	        View::composer('org.partials.dashboard_v1', function ($view) {
    19	            // If another composer already provided $kpi, respect it.
    20	            $data = $view->getData();
    21	            if (isset($data['kpi'])) return;
    22	
    23	            $orgId = DB::table('organizations')->where('owner_user_id', Auth::id())->value('id');
    24	            $key = 'kpi:org:' . ($orgId ?: 0);
    25	
    26	            $kpi = Cache::remember($key, 60, function () use ($orgId) {
    27	                try {
    28	                    $now = Carbon::now();
    29	                    $out = ['upcoming'=>0,'appsTotal'=>0,'appsApproved'=>0,'appsPending'=>0,'checkinsToday'=>0];
    30	                    if (!$orgId) return $out;
    31	
    32	                    $oppIds = DB::table('opportunities')->where('organization_id', $orgId)->pluck('id');
    33	                    $out['upcoming'] = DB::table('opportunities')->where('organization_id', $orgId)->where('start_at', '>=', $now)->count();
    34	                    if ($oppIds->isEmpty()) return $out;
    35	
    36	                    $out['appsTotal']    = DB::table('applications')->whereIn('opportunity_id', $oppIds)->count();
    37	                    $out['appsApproved'] = DB::table('applications')->whereIn('opportunity_id', $oppIds)->where('status','approved')->count();
    38	                    $out['appsPending']  = DB::table('applications')->whereIn('opportunity_id', $oppIds)->where('status','pending')->count();
    39	                    $out['checkinsToday']= DB::table('attendances')->whereIn('opportunity_id', $oppIds)->whereDate('check_in_at', $now->toDateString())->count();
    40	                    return $out;
    41	                } catch (\Throwable $e) {
    42	                    return ['upcoming'=>0,'appsTotal'=>0,'appsApproved'=>0,'appsPending'=>0,'checkinsToday'=>0];
    43	                }
    44	            });
    45	
    46	            $view->with('kpi', $kpi);
    47	        });
    48	    }
    49	}

=== app/Providers/UaePassSocialiteServiceProvider.php (first 200) ===
     1	<?php
     2	
     3	namespace App\Providers;
     4	
     5	use App\Services\Socialite\UaePassProvider;
     6	use Illuminate\Support\ServiceProvider;
     7	use Laravel\Socialite\Facades\Socialite;
     8	
     9	class UaePassSocialiteServiceProvider extends ServiceProvider
    10	{
    11	    public function register(): void {}
    12	    public function boot(): void
    13	    {
    14	        Socialite::extend('uaepass', function ($app) {
    15	            $cfg = $app['config']['services.uaepass'];
    16	            return new UaePassProvider(
    17	                $app['request'],
    18	                $cfg['client_id'],
    19	                $cfg['client_secret'],
    20	                $cfg['redirect']
    21	            );
    22	        });
    23	    }
    24	}

=== app/Providers/SpatieAliasesServiceProvider.php (first 200) ===
     1	<?php
     2	namespace App\Providers;
     3	use Illuminate\Support\ServiceProvider;
     4	use Illuminate\Routing\Router;
     5	
     6	class SpatieAliasesServiceProvider extends ServiceProvider
     7	{
     8	    public function boot(Router $router): void
     9	    {
    10	        $router->aliasMiddleware('role', \App\Http\Middleware\EnsureRole::class);
    11	        $router->aliasMiddleware('permission', \App\Http\Middleware\EnsureRole::class);
    12	        $router->aliasMiddleware('role_or_permission', \App\Http\Middleware\EnsureRole::class);
    13	    }
    14	}

=== app/Providers/MiddlewareAliasesServiceProvider.php (first 200) ===
     1	<?php
     2	namespace App\Providers;
     3	
     4	use Illuminate\Support\ServiceProvider;
     5	use Illuminate\Routing\Router;
     6	use App\Http\Middleware\EnsureRole;
     7	
     8	class MiddlewareAliasesServiceProvider extends ServiceProvider
     9	{
    10	    public function boot(Router $router): void
    11	    {
    12	        $router->aliasMiddleware('role', EnsureRole::class);
    13	        $router->aliasMiddleware('permission', EnsureRole::class);
    14	        $router->aliasMiddleware('role_or_permission', EnsureRole::class);
    15	        $router->aliasMiddleware('org', EnsureRole::class);
    16	    }
    17	}

=== UAEPASS routes available ===

=== app/Http/Controllers/Auth/UAEPassController.php (first 220) ===
     1	<?php
     2	
     3	namespace App\Http\Controllers\Auth;
     4	
     5	use App\Http\Controllers\Controller;
     6	use Illuminate\Http\Request;
     7	
     8	class UAEPassController extends Controller
     9	{
    10	    public function redirect()
    11	    {
    12	        // Require env values to be set first
    13	        if (!config('services.uaepass.client_id') || !env('UAEPASS_DISCOVERY_URL') || !env('UAEPASS_ISSUER')) {
    14	            return back()->with('error', 'UAEPass is not configured yet. Please add UAEPASS_ISSUER and UAEPASS_DISCOVERY_URL to .env');
    15	        }
    16	        // Minimal placeholder: send user to callback with a notice for now.
    17	        // (Swap this with a full OIDC flow once the values are provided.)
    18	        return redirect()->route('uaepass.callback')->with('error','UAEPass OIDC wiring pending configuration.');
    19	    }
    20	
    21	    public function callback(Request $request)
    22	    {
    23	        return redirect('/volunteer/login')->with('error', 'UAEPass not fully configured yet.');
    24	    }
    25	}

app/M:37:    public function qr(Opportunity $opportunity)    {        // Organizer-only protection (works if you use Spatie roles)        $user = auth()->user();        if (!$user || (!$user->hasRole('org') && !$user->hasRole('admin') && $user->id !== $opportunity->organizer_id)) {            abort(403);        }        return view('opportunities.qr', compact('opportunity'));    }    public function checkIn(Request $request)    {        $request->validate(['opp' => 'required|integer','token' => 'required|string']);        $opportunity = Opportunity::findOrFail($request->input('opp'));        if ($opportunity->checkin_token !== $request->input('token')) {            return redirect('/')->with('error', __('Invalid check-in token.'));        }        if (!auth()->check()) return redirect()->rou

     1	<?php
     2	namespace App\Http\Controllers;
     3	
     4	use App\Models\Event;
     5	use SimpleSoftwareIO\QrCode\Facades\QrCode;
     6	
     7	class EventQrController extends Controller
     8	{
     9	    public function show(Event $event)
    10	    {
    11	        $qr = QrCode::size(200)->generate(route('events.checkin', $event));
    12	        return view('events.qr', compact('event', 'qr'));
    13	    }
    14	}

=== app/Http/Controllers/QrScanController.php (first 220) ===
     1	<?php
     2	
     3	namespace App\Http\Controllers;
     4	
     5	use Illuminate\Http\Request;
     6	use App\Models\Attendance;
     7	use App\Models\QrScan;
     8	use Carbon\Carbon;
     9	
    10	class QrScanController extends Controller
    11	{
    12	    /**
    13	     * Handle QR scan via GET request.
    14	     */
    15	    public function scan(Request $request, Attendance $attendance, $action)
    16	    {
    17	        // Log scan
    18	        QrScan::create([
    19	            'attendance_id' => $attendance->id,
    20	            'ip_address'    => $request->ip(),
    21	            'user_agent'    => $request->userAgent(),
    22	        ]);
    23	
    24	        $message = '';
    25	        $status = 'success';
    26	
    27	        if ($action === 'checkin') {
    28	            if (is_null($attendance->check_in)) {
    29	                $attendance->check_in = Carbon::now();
    30	                $message = __('You have successfully checked in for this event.');
    31	            } else {
    32	                $message = __('You have already checked in.');
    33	                $status = 'info';
    34	            }
    35	        } elseif ($action === 'checkout') {
    36	            if (!is_null($attendance->check_in) && is_null($attendance->check_out)) {
    37	                $attendance->check_out = Carbon::now();
    38	                $message = __('You have successfully checked out from this event.');
    39	            } else {
    40	                $message = __('You have already checked out.');
    41	                $status = 'info';
    42	            }
    43	        } else {
    44	            $message = __('Invalid action.');
    45	            $status = 'danger';
    46	        }
    47	
    48	        $attendance->save();
    49	
    50	        return view('qr.scan-result', [
    51	            'status' => $status,
    52	            'message' => $message,
    53	            'attendance' => $attendance
    54	        ]);
    55	    }
    56	}

=== app/Http/Controllers/AttendanceController.php (first 220) ===
     1	<?php
     2	namespace App\Http\Controllers;
     3	use Illuminate\Http\Request;
     4	use Illuminate\Support\Facades\DB;
     5	class AttendanceController extends Controller
     6	{
     7	    private function needAuth(Request $r){ return $r->user() ? null : redirect()->guest(route('login'))->with('status', __('Please sign in to continue.')); }
     8	
     9	    public function checkin(Request $r, string $token){
    10	        if ($redir = $this->needAuth($r)) return $redir;
    11	        $opp = DB::table('opportunities')->where('checkin_token',$token)->first(); abort_unless($opp,404);
    12	        DB::table('attendances')->updateOrInsert(
    13	            ['user_id'=>$r->user()->id,'opportunity_id'=>$opp->id],
    14	            ['checkin_at'=>now(),'status'=>'checked_in','source'=>'qr','updated_at'=>now(),'created_at'=>now()]
    15	        );
    16	        return view('attendance.ok', ['mode'=>'in','opp'=>$opp]);
    17	    }
    18	    public function checkout(Request $r, string $token){
    19	        if ($redir = $this->needAuth($r)) return $redir;
    20	        $opp = DB::table('opportunities')->where('checkout_token',$token)->first(); abort_unless($opp,404);
    21	        DB::table('attendances')->updateOrInsert(
    22	            ['user_id'=>$r->user()->id,'opportunity_id'=>$opp->id],
    23	            ['checkout_at'=>now(),'status'=>'checked_out','source'=>'qr','updated_at'=>now(),'created_at'=>now()]
    24	        );
    25	        return view('attendance.ok', ['mode'=>'out','opp'=>$opp]);
    26	    }
    27	}

=== app/Http/Controllers/Admin/AttendanceAdminController.php (first 220) ===
     1	<?php
     2	
     3	namespace App\Http\Controllers\Admin;
     4	
     5	use App\Http\Controllers\Controller;
     6	use Illuminate\Http\Request;
     7	use Illuminate\Support\Facades\DB;
     8	use Illuminate\Support\Str;
     9	use App\Services\HoursService;
    10	use App\Services\CertificateService;
    11	
    12	class AttendanceAdminController extends Controller
    13	{
    14	    public function qr(Request $request, int $opportunityId)
    15	    {
    16	        $opp = DB::table('opportunities')->where('id',$opportunityId)->first();
    17	        abort_unless($opp,404);
    18	
    19	        // generate tokens if missing
    20	        $updates = [];
    21	        if (empty($opp->checkin_token))  $updates['checkin_token']  = Str::random(40);
    22	        if (empty($opp->checkout_token)) $updates['checkout_token'] = Str::random(40);
    23	        if ($updates) {
    24	            DB::table('opportunities')->where('id',$opportunityId)->update($updates);
    25	            $opp = DB::table('opportunities')->where('id',$opportunityId)->first();
    26	        }
    27	
    28	        $checkinUrl  = url('/a/'.$opp->checkin_token);
    29	        $checkoutUrl = url('/a/'.$opp->checkout_token);
    30	
    31	        return view('admin.attendance.qr', compact('opp','checkinUrl','checkoutUrl'));
    32	    }
    33	
    34	    public function index(Request $request)
    35	    {
    36	        $oid = (int) $request->get('opportunity_id', 0);
    37	        $rows = DB::table('attendances as a')
    38	            ->join('users as u','u.id','=','a.user_id')
    39	            ->when($oid>0, fn($x)=>$x->where('a.opportunity_id',$oid))
    40	            ->orderByDesc('a.id')
    41	            ->select('a.*','u.name','u.volunteer_code')
    42	            ->paginate(30)->withQueryString();
    43	
    44	        return view('admin.attendance.index', compact('rows','oid'));
    45	    }
    46	
    47	    public function manual(Request $request, int $opportunityId)
    48	    {
    49	        $request->validate([
    50	            'user_id'=>'required|integer',
    51	            'action' =>'required|in:checkin,checkout',
    52	        ]);
    53	        $u = (int)$request->user_id;
    54	        $row = DB::table('attendances')->where(['user_id'=>$u,'opportunity_id'=>$opportunityId])->first();
    55	        if ($request->action==='checkin') {
    56	            if ($row) {
    57	                if (empty($row->checkin_at)) {
    58	                    DB::table('attendances')->where('id',$row->id)->update([
    59	                        'checkin_at'=>now(),'status'=>'checked_in','source'=>'manual','updated_at'=>now()
    60	                    ]);
    61	                }
    62	            } else {
    63	                DB::table('attendances')->insert([
    64	                    'user_id'=>$u,'opportunity_id'=>$opportunityId,
    65	                    'checkin_at'=>now(),'status'=>'checked_in','source'=>'manual',
    66	                    'created_at'=>now(),'updated_at'=>now(),
    67	                ]);
    68	            }
    69	        } else { // checkout
    70	            if ($row && !empty($row->checkin_at)) {
    71	                DB::table('attendances')->where('id',$row->id)->update([
    72	                    'checkout_at'=>now(),'status'=>'checked_out','updated_at'=>now()
    73	                ]);
    74	            } else {
    75	                DB::table('attendances')->insert([
    76	                    'user_id'=>$u,'opportunity_id'=>$opportunityId,
    77	                    'checkout_at'=>now(),'status'=>'flagged','source'=>'manual',
    78	                    'created_at'=>now(),'updated_at'=>now(),
    79	                ]);
    80	            }
    81	        }
    82	        return back()->with('status', __('Attendance updated'));
    83	    }
    84	
    85	    public function finalize(Request $request, int $opportunityId)
    86	    {
    87	        $n = HoursService::finalize($opportunityId);
    88	        return back()->with('status', __('Finalized hours for :n records',['n'=>$n]));
    89	    }
    90	
    91	    public function complete(Request $request, int $opportunityId)
    92	    {
    93	        // mark completed
    94	        DB::table('opportunities')->where('id',$opportunityId)->update([
    95	            'status'=>'completed','completed_at'=>now(),'updated_at'=>now()
    96	        ]);
    97	
    98	        // finalize hours and issue certificates
    99	        $n = \App\Services\HoursService::finalize($opportunityId);
   100	        $c = \App\Services\CertificateService::issueForOpportunity($opportunityId);
   101	
   102	        return back()->with('status', __("Completed. Finalized hours: :n, Certificates issued: :c", ['n'=>$n,'c'=>$c]));
   103	    }
   104	}

=== app/Http/Controllers/Org/AttendanceController.php (first 220) ===
     1	<?php
     2	namespace App\Http\Controllers\Org;
     3	use App\Http\Controllers\Controller;
     4	use App\Models\Opportunity;
     5	use Illuminate\Http\Request;
     6	use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Auth;
     7	use Illuminate\Support\Facades\DB;
     8	use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Cache;
     9	use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Schema;
    10	use Illuminate\Support\Str;
    11	
    12	class AttendanceController extends Controller
    13	{
    14	    const SCAN_COOLDOWN_SECONDS = 10;
    15	    const RATE_LIMIT_MAX = 6;   // scans
    16	    const RATE_LIMIT_WINDOW = 5; // seconds
    17	
    18	    public function scan(Opportunity $opportunity)
    19	    {
    20	        $this->authorize('manage', $opportunity);
    21	        return view('org.attendance.scan', ['opportunity'=>$opportunity,'csrf'=>csrf_token()]);
    22	    }
    23	
    24	    public function checkin(Request $request, Opportunity $opportunity)
    25	    {
    26	        $this->authorize('manage', $opportunity);
    27	        if ($msg = $this->throttleMessage($opportunity->id)) {
    28	            return response()->json(['ok'=>false,'message'=>$msg], 429);
    29	        }
    30	
    31	        $payload = trim((string)($request->input('qr') ?? ''));
    32	        if ($payload==='') return response()->json(['ok'=>false,'message'=>'QR payload missing'],422);
    33	
    34	        $lat = $request->input('lat'); $lng = $request->input('lng'); $acc = $request->input('acc');
    35	
    36	        $parsed = $this->parsePayload($payload);
    37	        $userId = $parsed['user_id'] ?? $this->resolveVolunteerFromPayload($payload);
    38	        if (!$userId) { $this->logScan($opportunity->id,'checkin',$payload,false,'volunteer_not_found',null,$lat,$lng,$acc); return response()->json(['ok'=>false,'message'=>'Volunteer not found'],404); }
    39	
    40	        if ($this->recentDuplicate($opportunity->id,$userId,'checkin')) return response()->json(['ok'=>true,'message'=>'Duplicate scan (ignored)']);
    41	
    42	        if (!$this->passesGeofence($opportunity->id, $lat, $lng)) {
    43	            $this->logScan($opportunity->id,'checkin',$payload,false,'outside_geofence',$userId,$lat,$lng,$acc);
    44	            return response()->json(['ok'=>false,'message'=>'Outside geofence area'], 403);
    45	        }
    46	
    47	        // Already open?
    48	        $open = DB::table('attendances')->where('opportunity_id',$opportunity->id)->where('user_id',$userId)->whereNull('check_out_at')->orderByDesc('id')->first();
    49	        if ($open) { $this->logScan($opportunity->id,'checkin',$payload,true,'already_open',$userId,$lat,$lng,$acc); return response()->json(['ok'=>true,'message'=>'Already checked-in']); }
    50	
    51	        $now = now();
    52	        $insert = [
    53	            'opportunity_id'=>$opportunity->id, 'user_id'=>$userId, 'status'=>'present',
    54	            'check_in_at'=>$now, 'minutes'=>0, 'created_at'=>$now, 'updated_at'=>$now,
    55	        ];
    56	        if (Schema::hasColumn('attendances','check_in_lat')) {
    57	            $insert += ['check_in_lat'=>$lat,'check_in_lng'=>$lng,'check_in_acc'=>$acc];
    58	        }
    59	        DB::table('attendances')->insert($insert);
    60	
    61	        $this->logScan($opportunity->id,'checkin',$payload,true,null,$userId,$lat,$lng,$acc);
    62	        return response()->json(['ok'=>true,'message'=>'Check-in recorded']);
    63	    }
    64	
    65	    public function checkout(Request $request, Opportunity $opportunity)
    66	    {
    67	        $this->authorize('manage', $opportunity);
    68	        if ($msg = $this->throttleMessage($opportunity->id)) {
    69	            return response()->json(['ok'=>false,'message'=>$msg], 429);
    70	        }
    71	
    72	        $payload = trim((string)($request->input('qr') ?? ''));
    73	        if ($payload==='') return response()->json(['ok'=>false,'message'=>'QR payload missing'],422);
    74	
    75	        $lat = $request->input('lat'); $lng = $request->input('lng'); $acc = $request->input('acc');
    76	
    77	        $parsed = $this->parsePayload($payload);
    78	        $userId = $parsed['user_id'] ?? $this->resolveVolunteerFromPayload($payload);
    79	        if (!$userId) { $this->logScan($opportunity->id,'checkout',$payload,false,'volunteer_not_found',null,$lat,$lng,$acc); return response()->json(['ok'=>false,'message'=>'Volunteer not found'],404); }
    80	
    81	        if ($this->recentDuplicate($opportunity->id,$userId,'checkout')) return response()->json(['ok'=>true,'message'=>'Duplicate scan (ignored)']);
    82	
    83	        if (!$this->passesGeofence($opportunity->id, $lat, $lng)) {
    84	            $this->logScan($opportunity->id,'checkout',$payload,false,'outside_geofence',$userId,$lat,$lng,$acc);
    85	            return response()->json(['ok'=>false,'message'=>'Outside geofence area'], 403);
    86	        }
    87	
    88	        $open = DB::table('attendances')->where('opportunity_id',$opportunity->id)->where('user_id',$userId)->whereNull('check_out_at')->orderByDesc('id')->first();
    89	        if (!$open) { $this->logScan($opportunity->id,'checkout',$payload,false,'no_open_session',$userId,$lat,$lng,$acc); return response()->json(['ok'=>false,'message'=>'No open check-in found'],409); }
    90	
    91	        $now = now(); $checkIn = \Illuminate\Support\Carbon::parse($open->check_in_at);
    92	        $mins = max(1,(int)ceil($checkIn->diffInSeconds($now)/60));
    93	        $update = ['check_out_at'=>$now,'minutes'=>$mins,'updated_at'=>$now];
    94	        if (Schema::hasColumn('attendances','check_out_lat')) $update += ['check_out_lat'=>$lat,'check_out_lng'=>$lng,'check_out_acc'=>$acc];
    95	        DB::table('attendances')->where('id',$open->id)->update($update);
    96	
    97	        $this->logScan($opportunity->id,'checkout',$payload,true,null,$userId,$lat,$lng,$acc);
    98	        return response()->json(['ok'=>true,'message'=>'Check-out recorded','minutes_added'=>$mins]);
    99	    }
   100	
   101	    public function undo(Request $request, int $attendanceId)
   102	    {
   103	        $row = DB::table('attendances')->where('id',$attendanceId)->first();
   104	        if (!$row) return back()->with('status','Attendance not found.');
   105	        $this->authorize('manage-attendance', $attendanceId);
   106	
   107	        if ($row->check_out_at) {
   108	            DB::table('attendances')->where('id',$attendanceId)->update(['check_out_at'=>null,'minutes'=>0,'updated_at'=>now()]);
   109	            $msg='Checkout undone; session reopened.';
   110	        } else {
   111	            if (Schema::hasColumn('attendances','deleted_at')) DB::table('attendances')->where('id',$attendanceId)->update(['deleted_at'=>now(),'updated_at'=>now()]);
   112	            else DB::table('attendances')->where('id',$attendanceId)->delete();
   113	            $msg='Open check-in removed.';
   114	        }
   115	        DB::table('audit_logs')->insert([
   116	            'actor_id'=>Auth::id(),'action'=>'attendance.undo','entity_type'=>'attendance','entity_id'=>$attendanceId,
   117	            'note'=>json_encode(['reason'=>$request->input('reason'),'ip'=>request()->ip()]),'created_at'=>now(),'updated_at'=>now(),
   118	        ]);
   119	        return back()->with('status',$msg);
   120	    }
   121	
   122	    /* ---------- Helpers ---------- */
   123	
   124	    private function throttleMessage(int $oppId): ?string
   125	    {
   126	        $ip = request()->ip();
   127	        $key = "scan:opp:$oppId:ip:$ip";
   128	        $now = now()->timestamp;
   129	        $bucket = Cache::get($key, []);
   130	        $bucket = array_values(array_filter($bucket, fn($ts)=>($now - $ts) < self::RATE_LIMIT_WINDOW));
   131	        $bucket[] = $now;
   132	        Cache::put($key, $bucket, self::RATE_LIMIT_WINDOW+1);
   133	        if (count($bucket) > self::RATE_LIMIT_MAX) return __('Too many scans — please slow down.');
   134	        return null;
   135	    }
   136	
   137	    private function parsePayload(string $p): array
   138	    {
   139	        if (stripos($p,'SUQR:')===0) {
   140	            $body = substr($p,5); $out=[];
   141	            foreach (array_filter(array_map('trim', explode(';',$body))) as $kv){ [$k,$v]=array_map('trim', explode('=',$kv,2)+[null,null]); if($k&&$v!==null)$out[strtolower($k)]=$v; }
   142	            $res=[]; if(!empty($out['uid'])&&is_numeric($out['uid']))$res['user_id']=(int)$out['uid']; if(!empty($out['user_id'])&&is_numeric($out['user_id']))$res['user_id']=(int)$out['user_id']; return $res;
   143	        }
   144	        if (str_starts_with($p,'{') && str_ends_with($p,'}')) { try { $j=json_decode($p,true,512,JSON_THROW_ON_ERROR); $r=[]; if(isset($j['user_id'])&&is_numeric($j['user_id']))$r['user_id']=(int)$j['user_id']; if(isset($j['uid'])&&is_numeric($j['uid']))$r['user_id']=(int)$j['uid']; if(!empty($j['email'])){ $u=DB::table('users')->where('email',$j['email'])->value('id'); if($u)$r['user_id']=(int)$u; } return $r; } catch(\Throwable $e){} }
   145	        return [];
   146	    }
   147	    private function resolveVolunteerFromPayload(string $p): ?int
   148	    {
   149	        if (preg_match('/[A-Z0-9._%+\-]+@[A-Z0-9.\-]+\.[A-Z]{2,}/i',$p,$m)){ $u=DB::table('users')->where('email',$m[0])->value('id'); if($u)return (int)$u; }
   150	        if (preg_match('/(?:uid|user)\s*[:=]\s*(\d{1,10})/i',$p,$m)) return (int)$m[1];
   151	        if (preg_match('/^\d{1,10}$/',$p)) return (int)$p;
   152	        return null;
   153	    }
   154	    private function passesGeofence(int $oppId, $lat, $lng): bool
   155	    {
   156	        if ($lat===null || $lng===null) return true; // allow if no location available
   157	        $opp = DB::table('opportunities')->where('id',$oppId)->first();
   158	        $glat = $opp->geofence_lat ?? DB::table('settings')->where('key',"opp:{$oppId}:geofence_lat")->value('value');
   159	        $glng = $opp->geofence_lng ?? DB::table('settings')->where('key',"opp:{$oppId}:geofence_lng")->value('value');
   160	        $radm = $opp->geofence_radius_m ?? DB::table('settings')->where('key',"opp:{$oppId}:geofence_radius_m")->value('value');
   161	        if (!$glat || !$glng || !$radm) return true; // geofence not set
   162	        $d = $this->haversine($lat,$lng,$glat,$glng); // meters
   163	        return $d <= (int)$radm;
   164	    }
   165	    private function haversine($lat1,$lon1,$lat2,$lon2): float
   166	    {
   167	        $R=6371000; $φ1=deg2rad($lat1); $φ2=deg2rad($lat2); $Δφ=deg2rad($lat2-$lat1); $Δλ=deg2rad($lon2-$lon1);
   168	        $a=sin($Δφ/2)**2 + cos($φ1)*cos($φ2)*sin($Δλ/2)**2; return $R*2*atan2(sqrt($a),sqrt(1-$a));
   169	    }
   170	    private function recentDuplicate(int $oppId,int $userId,string $action): bool
   171	    {
   172	        $since = now()->subSeconds(self::SCAN_COOLDOWN_SECONDS);
   173	        return DB::table('qr_scans')->where('opportunity_id',$oppId)->where('user_id',$userId)->where('action',$action)->where('ok',1)->where('created_at','>=',$since)->exists();
   174	    }
   175	    private function logScan(int $oppId,string $action,string $payload,bool $ok,?string $note=null,?int $userId=null,$lat=null,$lng=null,$acc=null): void
   176	    {
   177	        DB::table('qr_scans')->insert([
   178	          'opportunity_id'=>$oppId,'org_user_id'=>Auth::id(),'user_id'=>$userId,'payload'=>$payload,'action'=>$action,'ok'=>$ok?1:0,'note'=>$note,
   179	          'minutes'=>null,'ip'=>request()->ip(),'user_agent'=>substr((string)request()->userAgent(),0,255),
   180	          'created_at'=>now(),'updated_at'=>now(),
   181	        ]);
   182	    }
   183	}

=== app/Http/Controllers/Admin/OpportunityQRController.php (first 220) ===
     1	<?php
     2	namespace App\Http\Controllers\Admin;
     3	use App\Http\Controllers\Controller;
     4	use Illuminate\Http\Request;
     5	use Illuminate\Support\Facades\DB;
     6	use Illuminate\Support\Str;
     7	
     8	class OpportunityQRController extends Controller
     9	{
    10	    private function ensureTokens($opp){
    11	        $changes=[];
    12	        if (empty($opp->checkin_token))  $changes['checkin_token']=Str::random(32);
    13	        if (empty($opp->checkout_token)) $changes['checkout_token']=Str::random(32);
    14	        if ($changes){
    15	            DB::table('opportunities')->where('id',$opp->id)->update($changes+['updated_at'=>now()]);
    16	            $opp = DB::table('opportunities')->where('id',$opp->id)->first();
    17	        }
    18	        return $opp;
    19	    }
    20	
    21	    public function show($id){
    22	        $opp = DB::table('opportunities')->where('id',$id)->first(); abort_unless($opp,404);
    23	        $opp = $this->ensureTokens($opp);
    24	        $checkinUrl  = url('/op/checkin/'.$opp->checkin_token);
    25	        $checkoutUrl = url('/op/checkout/'.$opp->checkout_token);
    26	        return view('admin.opportunities.qr', compact('opp','checkinUrl','checkoutUrl'));
    27	    }
    28	
    29	    public function reset($id){
    30	        $exists = DB::table('opportunities')->where('id',$id)->exists(); abort_unless($exists,404);
    31	        DB::table('opportunities')->where('id',$id)->update([
    32	            'checkin_token'=>Str::random(32),
    33	            'checkout_token'=>Str::random(32),
    34	            'updated_at'=>now(),
    35	        ]);
    36	        return redirect()->route('admin.opportunities.qr',$id)->with('status', __('Tokens regenerated'));
    37	    }
    38	
    39	    public function finalize($id){
    40	        $n = \App\Services\HoursService::finalize((int)$id);
    41	        return redirect()->route('admin.opportunities.qr',$id)->with('status', __("Finalized :n records", ['n'=>$n]));
    42	    }
    43	
    44	    public function issue($id){
    45	        $rows = DB::table('volunteer_hours')->where(['opportunity_id'=>$id,'locked'=>true])->get()->groupBy('user_id');
    46	        $issued=0;
    47	        foreach ($rows as $uid=>$group){
    48	            $hours = round($group->sum('minutes')/60,2);
    49	            if ($hours<=0) continue;
    50	            $exists = DB::table('certificates')->where(['user_id'=>$uid,'opportunity_id'=>$id])->exists();
    51	            if ($exists) continue;
    52	            DB::table('certificates')->insert([
    53	                'user_id'=>$uid,'opportunity_id'=>$id,'hours'=>$hours,
    54	                'code'=>'C'.strtoupper(Str::random(8)),'uuid'=>Str::uuid(),
    55	                'created_at'=>now(),'updated_at'=>now(),
    56	            ]);
    57	            $issued++;
    58	        }
    59	        return redirect()->route('admin.opportunities.qr',$id)->with('status', __("Issued :n certificates", ['n'=>$issued]));
    60	    }
    61	}

=== resources/views/components/avatar-controls.blade.php ===

     2	    $u = auth()->user();
     3	    $avatarUrl = $u && $u->avatar_path
     4	        ? \Illuminate\Support\Facades\Storage::disk('public')->url($u->avatar_path)
     5	        : asset('images/avatar-placeholder.svg');

    11	  <div style="display:flex;gap:.5rem;flex-wrap:wrap">
    12	    <form id="avatar-upload-form" action="{{ route('profile.avatar.store') }}" method="POST" enctype="multipart/form-data">
    13	      @csrf
    14	      <input id="avatar-file" name="avatar" type="file" accept="image/*" style="display:none"
    15	             onchange="document.getElementById('avatar-upload-form').submit();">
    16	      <button type="button" onclick="document.getElementById('avatar-file').click()" class="btn btn-primary">
    17	        Change Photo
    18	      </button>
    19	    </form>
    20	
    21	    <form action="{{ route('profile.avatar.destroy') }}" method="POST"
    22	          onsubmit="return confirm('Remove your photo?');" style="display:inline">
    23	      @csrf
    24	      @method('DELETE')
    25	      <button type="submit" class="btn btn-outline-danger">Remove</button>
    26	    </form>
    27	  </div>
    28	</div>

=== MiddlewareAliasesServiceProvider (ensure can/isAdmin) ===
     1	<?php
     2	namespace App\Providers;
     3	
     4	use Illuminate\Support\ServiceProvider;
     5	use Illuminate\Routing\Router;
     6	use App\Http\Middleware\EnsureRole;
     7	
     8	class MiddlewareAliasesServiceProvider extends ServiceProvider
     9	{
    10	    public function boot(Router $router): void
    11	    {
    12	        $router->aliasMiddleware('role', EnsureRole::class);
    13	        $router->aliasMiddleware('permission', EnsureRole::class);
    14	        $router->aliasMiddleware('role_or_permission', EnsureRole::class);
    15	        $router->aliasMiddleware('org', EnsureRole::class);
    16	    }
    17	}

=== config/permission.php (if Spatie present) ===
     1	<?php
     2	
     3	return [
     4	
     5	    'models' => [
     6	        'permission' => Spatie\Permission\Models\Permission::class,
     7	        'role' => Spatie\Permission\Models\Role::class,
     8	    ],
     9	
    10	    'table_names' => [
    11	        'roles' => 'acl_roles',
    12	        'permissions' => 'acl_permissions',
    13	        'model_has_permissions' => 'acl_model_has_permissions',
    14	        'model_has_roles' => 'acl_model_has_roles',
    15	        'role_has_permissions' => 'acl_role_has_permissions',
    16	    ],
    17	
    18	    'column_names' => [
    19	        'model_morph_key' => 'model_id',
    20	        'team_foreign_key' => 'team_id',
    21	    ],
    22	
    23	    // MUST be a boolean (not an array)
    24	    'teams' => false,
    25	
    26	    'register_permission_check_method' => true,
    27	
    28	    // keep these top-level
    29	    'display_permission_in_exception' => false,
    30	    'enable_wildcard_permission' => false,
    31	
    32	    'cache' => [
    33	        'expiration_time' => \DateInterval::createFromDateString('24 hours'),
    34	        'key' => 'spatie.permission.cache',
    35	        'store' => 'default',
    36	    ],
    37	];
